content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Part of electrical network group 15051

### Iron Production Line 1 at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Production Line 2 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify that items exist in the target chest before attempting to extract them
- Check if production line is actually producing the items you're trying to extract

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure required materials are collected before insertion operations

### Production line efficiency issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to keep production flowing
- Check if assembling machines have all required ingredients before expecting output

### Resource management
- Keep track of coal supplies for burner devices
- Maintain adequate raw material supplies for continuous production
- Monitor output storage to prevent bottlenecks
